  +
[[Image:OOoImpress.png|250px|thumb|OpenOffice.org Impress 2.3 on Windows]]
'''OpenOffice.org Impress''', a part of the [[OpenOffice.org]] [[office suite]] and developed by [[Sun Microsystems]], is a [[presentation program]] similar to [[Microsoft PowerPoint]].<ref>[http://www.sun.com/software/star/openoffice/ OpenOffice.org<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref name = "NewsForge">[http://www.newsforge.com/article.pl?sid=04/12/02/1544200 Linux.com :: Microsoft PowerPoint versus OpenOffice.org Impress<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> In addition to being able to create PDF files from presentations, it is also able to export presentations to [[SWF]] files allowing them to be played on any computer with a [[Flash player]] installed. It is able to view, edit and save files in several file formats, including the .ppt format, which is used by [[Microsoft PowerPoint]]. <ref>[http://www.openoffice.org/product/impress.html Impress<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
'''OpenOffice.org Impress''', a part of the [[OpenOffice.org]] [[office suite]] and developed by [[Sun Microsystems]], is a [[presentation program]] similar to [[Microsoft PowerPoint]].<ref>[http://www.sun.com/software/star/openoffice/ OpenOffice.org<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref name = "NewsForge">[http://www.newsforge.com/article.pl?sid=04/12/02/1544200 Linux.com :: Microsoft PowerPoint versus OpenOffice.org Impress<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> In addition to being able to create PDF files from presentations, it is also able to export presentations to [[SWF]] files allowing them to be played on any computer with a [[Flash player]] installed. It is able to view, edit and save files in several file formats, including the .ppt format, which is used by [[Microsoft PowerPoint]]. <ref>[http://www.openoffice.org/product/impress.html Impress<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
